title: Purchase Error (message) 3005
body: Every time I try to purchase more Riot Points I get the same damn message error 3005 I have ran out of tries on purchasing that item. I have tried multiple credit and debit cards and nothing seems to work. My brother even let me use his to see if anything changes and I still get the same message. I have no other problems with any other online purchases except this. How do I change this?

replies.body: I'm betting that there may be a browser issue preventing your purchase.  The store uses Internet Explorer for a lot of its functions, and can act weirdly if the browser corrupts somehow.  A fix could be as simple as [resetting your IE settings](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660).  If you continue to experience a problem, please reach out to player support by [submitting a ticket.  ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)  Hope that helps!
